com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm
Class TwoStepsGrid

java.lang.Object
  com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm.BaseGrid
      com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm.TwoStepsGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid
public class TwoStepsGrid
extends BaseGrid

A memory optimized implementation of Grid that can run any number of time step using the same amount of memory, by discarding the old steps.

Author:
Luigi Sgro

Constructor Summary

          Creates a memory-optimized grid.

TwoStepsGrid

public TwoStepsGrid(double tStep,
                    double tMin,
                    double tMax,
                    double sStep,
                    double sMin,
                    double sMax)
Creates a memory-optimized grid.

Parameters:
tStep - The time step
tMin - The time range minimum value
tMax - The time range maximum value
sStep - The step of the stock value
sMin - The minimum value of the stock range
sMax - The maximum value of the stock range
